subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort was built by Raja Man Singh of Amber?
question_hi: अम्बर के राजा मन सिंह से बनाया गया किस मंगलमार्ग के तहत?
explanation_en: Kumbhalgarh Fort was built by Rana Kumbha.
explanation_hi: कुम्भालगढ़ मंगलमार्ग राजन कुम्भा ने बनाया है।

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who was the builder of the famous Chittorgarh Fort?
question_hi: चीटरगढ़ मंगलमार्ग क्या मंगलमार्ग का बनवाया गया है।
explanation_en: Kumbhalgarh Raja Rawal was the builder of the famous Kumbhalgarh Fort.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which fort was constructed by Maharaja Suraj Mal?
question_hi: महाराज सुराज माल ने कौने मंगल बनवालने कियांचौराली माल
explanation_en: Maharaja Suraj Mal constructed the Kota Fort.
explanation_hi: महाराज सुराज सैंकेटा मंगल निर्मांगलोंचौराज सैंकेटेंगल

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who was the founder of Jaisamand Fort?
explanation_en: Bir Singh II was the founder of Jaisamand Fort.
explanation_hi: बिर सिंगल ने जैसामांगल के निरांगल ने जयांगल

subject: Rajasthan History
explanation_en: Nakula, a Rajput prince, is the builder of Meena Kachhra Fort.
